column4: I view an ungodly amount of pornography. How do I prevent it from showing up in 'recent documents' without needing to clear manually every time?
Anyone know?
View it online using a firefox extension that disables logging when you enable it and starts again when you disable it lol
I need to download and save said porn, since it's in .mpg format and the totem-xine browser plugin is broken.
I was joking lol.
Um... use VLC?
I'm quite serious. Bondage tends to freak out my grandmother.
She uses your account?
I'd rather not keep multiple accounts on my laptop.
If she knows to look into your recent documents for your porn, you might as well give her a seperate account
lol
Well letting them use your account then trying to stop them from seeing your stuff is a bit hard
True, but Firefox's Distrust extension tends to work well. I just don't want recent documents saved because I don't need it anyway.
Umm... well the only way i can think of would be not to open them through NAUTILUS, maybe another filer or through another video viewer
oh, in that case, i'd google something like "ubuntu disable recent documents"
That's a good idea, and I didn't think of that. Thanks.
no problem :)
I have something for you
http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-66821.html
I have something for you
http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-66821.html
